description: Transferring files with well-known filenames (sensitive files with credential data) using network shares Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Transferring sensitive files for legitimate administration work by legitimate administrator
name: Transferring Files with Credential Data via Network Shares
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND Provider_Name:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Security\-Auditing" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:(*\\mimidrv* OR *\\lsass* OR *\\windows\\minidump\\* OR *\\hiberfil* OR *\\sqldmpr* OR *\\sam* OR *\\ntds.dit* OR *\\security*))
